de.humatic.nmj
Class NetworkMidiOutput

java.lang.Object
  de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiPort
      de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiOutput

public class NetworkMidiOutput
extends NetworkMidiPort

This class represents a Midi output in nmj's public api and is not used when working with javax.sound.midi. To get a NetworkMidiOutput instance call openOutput on the NetworkMidiSystem.

Method Summary
 void close(NetworkMidiClient nmc)
          Closes the output and releases all the network resources it has allocated, given no more clients are attached.
 void sendMidi(byte[] data)
          Sends raw Midi data.
 void sendMidi(byte[][] data)
          Sends multiple raw MIDI messages in one network packet.

Method Detail

close

public void close(NetworkMidiClient nmc)
Closes the output and releases all the network resources it has allocated, given no more clients are attached. Otherwise only the calling client is removed.

Overrides:
close in class NetworkMidiPort

sendMidi

public void sendMidi(byte[] data)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Sends raw Midi data. It is in the application's responsibility to provide valid data here.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

sendMidi

public void sendMidi(byte[][] data)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Sends multiple raw MIDI messages in one network packet. It is in the application's responsibility to provide valid data. If the overall length of given data exceeds packet size limits, messages will be send separately. SysEx will currently not be packaged but always be sent in separate packets.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
